text: Alfredo Massazza was an Italian archer. He was born on 24 May 1923 and died on 17 March 2004. Massazza competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics.Alfredo MassazzaAlfredo MASSAZZA == References == Category:1943 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Italian archers Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Alfredo Massazza
